title: Amy Has A ‘Flip Out’ Parenting Moment + Famous Duos Fantasy Draft + Lunchbox On The Street Asking Drunk People Easy Trivia
itunes:title: Amy Has A ‘Flip Out’ Parenting Moment + Famous Duos Fantasy Draft + Lunchbox On The Street Asking Drunk People Easy Trivia
description:
Amy had a learning moment after she went off on her son when he got upset she wouldn’t let him have sugary cereal for dinner. We do our famous duos fantasy draft and Lunchbox hits the street with a microphone to ask drunk people easy trivia questions. Bobby and Amy make wager on if they will get them right or not.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
